mapper.select: SELECT PAGERENO, PAGEPARENTNO, PAGERETEXT, PAGEREDATE, PAGEREDELETE, PAGENO, ID, NICK, LEVEL FROM B_PAGEREPLY WHERE pageNO=#{pageNO} START WITH pageParentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR pageReNO=pageParentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY pageReNO ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT max(pageReNO)+1 FROM B_PAGEREPLY
INSERT INTO B_PAGEREPLY (PAGERENO, PAGEPARENTNO, PAGERETEXT, PAGEREDATE, PAGEREDELETE, PAGENO, ID, NICK) VALUES(#{pageReNO}, #{pageParentNO}, #{pageReText}, sysdate, '', #{pageNO}, #{id}, #{nick})
mapper.update: UPDATE B_PAGEREPLY SET PAGEPARENTNO=#{pageParentNO}, PAGERETEXT=#{pageReText}, PAGEREDATE=sysdate, PAGEREDELETE='', PAGENO=#{pageNO}, ID= #{id}, NICK=#{nick} WHERE PAGERENO=#{pageReNO}
